title: Pineapple Slice
lyrics:
[백현 "Pineapple Slice" 가사]
[Intro]
(Tell me the taste ain't good to ya)
(You know the taste is real)
(Girl, you can search the world for better love)
Tell me the taste ain't good to ya
You know the taste is real
There's never a better love
[Verse 1]
자연스레 건네
Oh, what's your name?
흔들린 듯해 너의 시선이
Don't look at me like I'm basic
향기롭고 특별해
I ain't just any little boy in a fairytale (Oh-oh-oh)
[Refrain]
선명한 색을 봐, it's like 4K
이대로 네게 보내는 초대
황홀하게 또 설레게, I'm drivin' you insane
온몸에 퍼져 가
나의 모든 걸 준 다음에
넌 벗어날 수 없게 돼, babe

[Pre-Chorus]
나 하날 선택해, 나 말곤 시시해
달콤함에 빠져 넌, go crazy
[Chorus]
And you stay callin' me extra sweet
Callin' me extra sweet
딱 한 입, pineapple slice of me
This pineapple slice of me
Dive deeper in this sweet
Deeper in this sweet (Oh)
딱 한 입, pineapple slice of me (Hey)
Take a bite of all of me, all of me
[Verse 2]
아무 비밀 없이 솔직히
Come and fall in love with me
숨길 수 없는 표정 이미
So go straight and try me, babe (Oh-oh-oh)
닿은 순간 알아챘던
직관적인 느낌
내 방식대로 매번
여운을 남길게
[Pre-Chorus]
날 믿기 전 모든 기억은 희미해
달콤함에 취해 넌, go crazy

[Chorus]
And you stay callin' me extra sweet (Callin')
Callin' me extra sweet (Oh, yeah)
딱 한 입, pineapple slice of me (Woah, woah, yeah)
This pineapple slice of me
Dive deeper in this sweet (Deeper)
Deeper in this sweet
딱 한 입, pineapple slice of me (Hey)
Take a bite of all of me, all of me
[Bridge]
다시 또 눈이 마주쳤을 때
나 말곤 모두 잊어
나 말곤 다 지워
네 맘속 단 하나 남은 건
It'll never taste the same
It's just a different thing, babe
[Chorus]
You stay callin' me extra sweet
Callin' me extra sweet (Come get it)
딱 한 입, pineapple slice of me (Oh)
This pineapple slice of me
Dive deeper in this sweet (Deeper)
Deeper in this sweet (Deeper)
딱 한 입, pineapple slice of me
Take a bite of all of me, all of me

[Outro]
Tell me the taste ain't good to ya
You know the taste is real (Ooh!)
Girl, you can search the world for better love
Tell me the taste ain't good to ya (Ho!)
You know the taste is real (Oh!)
There's never a better love
